trans-unit.source: Defines an abstract base class for composable part definitions, which describe and enable the creation of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Definisce una classe di base astratta per definizioni di parti componibili che descrivono e abilitano la creazione di oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of a part that the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> describes.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di una parte descritta da <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: Derived types that override this method should return a new instance of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> object every time that the method is invoked and should never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: I tipi derivati che eseguono l'override di questo metodo devono restituire una nuova istanza di un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> oggetto ogni volta che il metodo viene richiamato e non deve mai restituire `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> objects that describe the objects exported by the part defined by this <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> che descrivono gli oggetti esportati dalla parte definita da questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> objects that describe the exported objects provided by <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> objects created by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> che descrivono gli oggetti esportati forniti da oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> creati da <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: Overrides of this property should never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override di questa propriet√† non devono restituire mai `null`.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> objects created by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> do not provide exported objects, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection instead.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> degli oggetti creati dal <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> non forniscono oggetti esportati, restituire un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> raccolta invece.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" /> objects that describe the imports required by the part defined by this <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" /> che descrivono le importazioni richieste dalla parte definita da questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" /> objects that describe the imports required by <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> objects created by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition" /> che descrivono le importazioni richieste da oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> creati da <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: Overrides of this property should never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override di questa propriet√† non devono restituire mai `null`.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> objects created by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> do not have imports, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection instead.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> degli oggetti creati dal <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> non dispongono di importazioni, restituire un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> raccolta invece.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the metadata for this <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta dei metadati per questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the metadata for the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta che contiene i metadati per <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty, read-only <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione predefinita √® un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> vuoto di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: Overrides of this property should return a read-only <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object with a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparer, such as <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>, and should never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override di questa propriet√† devono restituire una sola lettura <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> oggetto con un operatore di confronto non linguistico, distinzione maiuscole/minuscole, ad esempio <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>e non devono mai restituire `null`.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> does not contain metadata, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object instead.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> non contengono i metadati, viene restituito un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> invece dell'oggetto.
